app.name: Trogdor: Reburninated
app.long_description:
A recreation of the Homestar Runner Flash game "Trogdor" with new features, made with SDL2. In-game button prompts are for Wii Remote, but a Gamecube controller also works.
https://github.com/Mode8fx/Trogdor-Reburninated
Trogdor is originally created and owned by the Brothers Chaps, and programmed by Jonathan Howe. Credits are listed in-game.
